title: Best Keyboard?
body: Hey all I am after a new mechanical keyboard and was wondering what you guys think the best one is? I will probably be picking out of corsair or razer so if you have any input that would be great.

replies.body: I've got the Razer Blackwidow Tournament Edition, it's a very nice mechanical keyboard for the cheap price (if you don't need the numpad) :)

Anything over $300 else you're a filthy casual.

https://ebgames.com.au/pc-159693-Razer-DeathStalker-Ultimate-Gaming-Keyboard-PC
That's the keyboard I have.

You do realize that this is expensive because of the useless screen on the right yea? Keyboards such as the BlackWidow or Corsair K95 are better in every way, that stupid thing isn't even a mechanical keyboard lmfao...

> [{quoted}](name=Unseen Predator,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xUOddp3U,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-13T06:20:03.921+0000)
>
> You do realize that this is expensive because of the useless screen on the right yea? Keyboards such as the BlackWidow or Corsair K95 are better in every way, that stupid thing isn't even a mechanical keyboard lmfao...

It has a high pricetag therefore its worth, who cares what OP wants when you can throw out 3hunna on a keyboard.
That's so stupid, price doesn't mean shit, my keyboard is better than yours and i paid half the price of yours.
I've already got the non ultimate version of that and I'm not a fan haha. Thanks for the inout though.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Minge,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xUOddp3U,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T03:26:40.746+0000)
>
> I've already got the non ultimate version of that and I'm not a fan haha. Thanks for the inout though.

Filthy casual.

https://www.ebgames.com.au/pc-205077-Razer-Blackwidow-Chroma-Keyboard-PC

or like it are really good.
Yeah get a razer blackwidow, chroma if you dare kek
